<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The inliner pass for the new pass manager.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This pass wires together the inlining utilities and the inline cost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// analysis into a CGSCC pass. It considers every call in every function in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the SCC and tries to inline if profitable. It can be tuned with a number of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// parameters to control what cost model is used and what tradeoffs are made</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// when making the decision.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// It should be noted that the legacy inliners do considerably more than this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// inliner pass does. They provide logic for manually merging allocas, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// doing considerable DCE including the DCE of dead functions. This pass makes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// every attempt to be simpler. DCE of functions requires complex reasoning</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// about comdat groups, etc. Instead, it is expected that other more focused</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// passes be composed to achieve the same end result.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinerpass"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinerpass/#a1c58fdde44c81bcabb4813490ef574b7">InlinerPass</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;InlinerPass&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinerpass/#a1c58fdde44c81bcabb4813490ef574b7"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinerpass/#a1c58fdde44c81bcabb4813490ef574b7">InlinerPass</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OnlyMandatory = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Module pass, wrapping the inliner pass. This works in conjunction with the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// InlineAdvisorAnalysis to facilitate inlining decisions taking into account</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">/// module-wide state, that need to keep track of inter-inliner pass runs, for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a given module. An InlineAdvisor is configured and kept alive for the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">/// duration of the ModuleInlinerWrapperPass::run.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/moduleinlinerwrapperpass"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/moduleinlinerwrapperpass/#aff89291a71c595f474b9fc7c99860170">ModuleInlinerWrapperPass</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
